member.name: M:AppointMate.DI.GetRequiredService``1(System.Action{``0})
member.summary: Gets the requested service from the service provider
member.typeparam: The type of the service. NOTE: Some services require a different approach when retrieving them. For example, some services , in order to function properly, require some variables that their default parameterless constructors can't set. In that case, use the methods located in the DI in their own library!
